text:
Suspecting foul play in the death of a labourer, relatives refused to give consent for post-mortem at the Salem Government Mohan Kumaramangalam Medical College Hospital here on Wednesday.

One Tuesday, G. Thirunavukarasu (25) of Vellalapatti in Karuppur, working in a silver anklet unit, in Shevapet fell ill and was admitted to the hospital where he died later.

Alleging foul play in his death, relatives lodged complaint with Shevapet police. On Wednesday, they refused to sign documents for post-mortem.

Police pacified them and later post-mortem was conducted.
title: Relatives allege foul play in death
